summary: "The Golden Girls" is an American comedy TV show that aired from 1985 to 1992. It's about four older women living together in Miami and stars Bea Arthur, Betty White, Rue McClanahan, and Estelle Getty. The show was very popular, winning many awards, including Emmy and Golden Globe Awards. It was praised for its humor and the actors' performances. Even today, many people still enjoy watching it, proving that it has stood the test of time.
title: The Golden Girls
